1.content: Set up Supabase backend infrastructure and obtain user credentials
1.details: Request Supabase authentication credentials from user to set up the backend database, authentication, storage, and payment processing infrastructure.

2.content: Build the core full-stack directory application
2.details: Develop the complete web application including: 1) React frontend with responsive design 2) Supabase backend with database tables for consultants, businesses, reviews, payments 3) User authentication system 4) Advanced search and filtering system 5) Consultant profile pages and business dashboard 6) Three-tier membership system (Free/Professional/Premium) 7) Stripe payment integration for subscriptions 8) Lead generation and quote request system 9) Review and rating functionality 10) Admin dashboard for revenue tracking

3.content: Create comprehensive content and SEO optimization
3.details: Generate all required content including: 1) 10 blog posts (500-1000 words each) on Brexit compliance topics 2) Static pages (About, How It Works, Pricing, etc.) 3) Dynamic landing page templates for cities, services, industries 4) Brexit Compliance Guide (5000 words) 5) SEO meta descriptions and schema markup 6) XML sitemap generation

4.details: Deploy the application with all features working including payment processing, user registration, directory functionality, and content management. Ensure fast loading, mobile optimization, and all technical requirements are met.
